name: Control: Override (B-Deshi Dev)
description:
Control Override Is A Puzzle Game About Control.

You play as a hacker who has hacked into an rogue AI to terminate it.
Remember, in cyberspace

You do not have control.
.
Obtain It.
.
Transfer It.

Master It.
.


Delve into a virtual cyberspace inside a rogue AI that YOU created in the past.

Solve puzzles. Break through the AI's security layers. Reach the core. Terminate the AI.

But Should You?

Key Features
  • Simple mechanics. Unexpected consequences
  • Elegantly designed puzzles.
  • Tons of levels.
  • A generous rewind mechanic that let's you fix your mistakes. Problem solving is an iterative process.
  • A minimalist neon art style.
  • A riveting story of a hacker who hacked an AI of his own creation.
